devdoc.details: This contract handles the creation, updating, and querying of user and retailer entities, leveraging mappings for efficient data retrieval.

returns._0: address[] A list of all entity addresses.

params.walletAddress: The wallet address of the entity.

returns._0: Entity The complete entity structure with all details.
address The wallet address associated with the email.
bool True if the address belongs to a retailer.
bool True if the address belongs to a user.

registerEntity(string,string,string,uint.details: Creates a new entity or updates an existing one, assigning it an initial balance of tokens.

params.additionalInfo: Additional information relevant to the entity
params.entityType: Type of the entity (User or Retailer)
params.ipfsHash: IPFS hash for extended data storage
params.name: Name of the entity
params.walletId: Unique identifier for the entity's wallet

updateEntity(string,string).details: Allows entities to update their information post-registration.

params.newValue: The new value for the specified property

devdoc.title: UserManager

getEntitiesList().notice: Retrieves a list of all registered entity addresses.

getEntity(address).notice: Retrieves detailed information about an entity.

getWalletByEmail(string).notice: Retrieves the wallet address associated with a given email.

isRetailer(address).notice: Checks if an address belongs to a retailer.

isUser(address).notice: Checks if an address belongs to a user.

registerEntity(string,string,string,uint.notice: Registers an entity with the provided details.

userdoc.notice: Manages registration and updates of user and retailer entities.
